rows.label: qst201315_msg0001
rows.name: Is this where the kids were playing?

rows.label: qst201315_msg0002
rows.name:
I can't see anything around here
that would count as a clue...

rows.label: qst201315_msg0004
rows.name:
But the sheer lack of clues itself points
to the possibility that someone has
been deliberately erasing any evidence.

rows.label: qst201315_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah, it does seem more likely it's
the work of criminals, rather than
being just a monster attack...

rows.label: qst201315_msg0006
rows.name:
At any rate, let's keep looking.
We still might find something.

rows.label: qst201315_msg0008
rows.name:
That boy's being attacked by
a monster!
